text: Michael Wardrop (born 23 December 1955) is a former English footballer who played as a midfielder for Manchester United and New York Cosmos. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |New York Cosmos |1974 |NASL |13||0||0||0||0||0||13||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !13!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!13!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:1955 births Category:English footballers Category:English expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:New York Cosmos players Category:Kettering Town F.C. players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the United States
title: Mike Wardrop
